resources.string: Üdvözli önt a Fájlkezelő! Ezzel az alkalmazással kezelheti a készülékén tárolt fájlokat.
Üdvözli önt a Fájlkezelő! Ezzel az alkalmazással kezelheti a készülékén tárolt fájlokat.
"Nem küldhető el ilyen sok elem egyszerre"
"Nem lehet fájlokat küldeni a külső tárhelyről"
"Due to Android 11 restrictions, you won't be able to view some of the files generated within the third party apps in File Manager."
Clear trash to free up storage space
Kattintson a belső tárhely és az SD-kártya közötti váltáshoz
"Nem sikerült tömöríteni. Egy azonos nevű fájl már létezik."
"Nem sikerült tömöríteni. A tárhely megtelt, vagy ismeretlen hiba történt."
"Nem sikerült kicsomagolni a fájlokat. A csomag sérült."
"Nem lehet kicsomagolni a fájlokat a megadott helyre."
A titkosított RAR fájlok nem támogatottak.
"Nem sikerült törölni a fájlokat. Próbálja újra"
"Encrypted and hid file. You can view hidden files by pulling down on the File Manager's start page."
"Can't encrypt files in folder /MIUI/Gallery/cloud/sharer. Move the file to another folder and try again."
The filename you entered is too long.
"Can't move or copy folders to themselves or their subfolders"
No app was found to handle this action.
"Can't open file. Copy the file to internal storage."
Allow access to SD card first
"File names can't contain the following characters: /\\:*?<>"
4–16 characters, letters and digits, case sensitive
Anonymization features might pose security risks. Use the feature anyway?
The username or password you entered is invalid.
"Couldn't open port. Check your network connection or reset port number."
For accessing IMEI and encrypting files
Now you can filter file formats, rearrange items, and switch between views by tapping the shortcut.
Recent items are grouped together by date.
Add, remove, and rearrange the start page shortcuts.
Gallery photos and screenshots are hidden by default.
Enter the following address into FTP client:
"File Manager is a system app. You won't be able to manage files on your device after you remove the Home screen shortcut."
All files in this folder will be hidden.
Turn on Mi Drop on the other device
When Mi Drop is on, you can search for devices nearby and send files
You can add up to %d shortcuts
Create a Home screen shortcut for File Manager to work with files more efficiently.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
"File Manager requires permission to access device's storage to work normally."
"Can't view this file at the moment."
Encrypt files in the private folder. Decrypting big files might take longer than expected.
For managing files remotely via Wi-Fi
\"%s\" already exists. Tap to replace it with the new file.
"Couldn't remove some files. Moved the rest of the files to %s."
"Couldn't access files. Allow File Manager to access files in the Settings."
"Couldn't access files. Allow File Manager to access files in the Settings.​"
"File Manager's storage accounting may differ from other apps"
Access photos and files on device

string.name: privacy_policy_renew_content
string.Data: "File Manager's Privacy Policy was updated. To fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we use your data, read and agree to the new version of Privacy Policy before you continue."

resources.string: Press and hold files or folders to add them to your private folder
File Manager is introducing an additional security measure: you can encrypt private files now!
Decryption will make removing files from the private folder slower. You can turn encryption on and off in the Settings.
To hide a file, press and hold it, then add it to a hidden folder.
Enter password used to unlock your device
Pull down to open private folder
"Due to Android 11 restrictions, File Manager can't access and display QQ documents."
"Don't show Gallery items and screenshots among recent files"
"If you change this file's extension, you may not be able to open it."
The file will be hidden after you change its extension.
A file with the name \"%s\" already exists.
To manage files on your SD card, give File Manager the required permissions.
Set your password again. Privacy protection password also works for photos and messages.
"Don't let display sleep while using FTP"
No app was found to handle this action.
Moving hidden folders from SD card…
Downloads and items transferred via Mi Share
"This file format isn't supported. Unpack this file and try again."
An unknown error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Privacy protection password also works for photos and messages.
"Due to Android 11 restrictions, File Manager can't access and display the documents previewed in WeChat. Open and save documents in WeChat to make them appear here."

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of File Manager. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As File Manager provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept File Manager services."
Withdraw consent to the Privacy Policy of File Manager
